author: admin
title: Penny Stocks Alerts for Terra Tech, MannKind, Pharmacyte Biotech, GT Advanced Technologies, EKSO BIONICS, and Baltia Air Lines
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/16/2015 @ 7:15 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Pennystocksinsiders.com 
PHOENIX, Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Pennystocksinsiders.com (PSI) released FREE insider trading reports for US market investors to track the following active stocks and penny stocks : Terra Tech (OTCMKTS:TRTC), MannKind (NASDAQ:MNKD), Pharmacyte Biotech (OTCMKTS:PMCB), GT Advanced Technologies (OTCMKTS:GTATQ), EKSO BIONICS (OTCBB:EKSO), and Baltia Air Lines (OTCMKTS:BLTA). 
(Read full report by clicking the links below, you may need to copy and paste the full link to your browser.) 
Report Highlights: 
Terra Tech Corp (OTCMKTS:TRTC): By the end of last trading, the Terra Tech (OTCMKTS:TRTC) shares rose 9.30% (or US$0.01) to US$0.09 with about 1.53 million shares changing hands for the session, compared to its average volume of 1.67 million shares. Last Friday, the company put up a press release and an accompanying 8-K filing containing a company presentation conducted on the previous day and containing "non-public information". Yesterday, the company announced that IVXX is now available at 60 additional medical cannabis collectives located in Orange and San Bernardino Counties, California. Is this company running promotion by penny stock promoter? Is there any insider trading in this company? Read full report Mere. 
Read Full Report: http://www.Pennystocksinsiders.com/PR5/101615A/TRTC/TerraTech.pdf 
MannKind Corporation (NASDAQ:MNKD): By the end of last trading, the MannKind (NASDAQ:MNKD) shares earned 4.10% (or US$0.12) to US$3.05 with about 5.71 million shares changing hands for the session, compared to its average volume of 5.03 million shares. The biotech company focused on developing diabetes-related therapeutic solutions did get official clearance by the FDA to market its AFREZZA, a rapid-acting inhaled insulin in late-June 2014. According to its Q2 financial report, AFREZZA became fully accessible in February, but it generate zero revenue. Is there any insider trading in this company? Is this company running promotion by penny stock promoter? Is there any insider trading in this company? Read full report here. 
Read Full Report: http://www.Pennystocksinsiders.com/PR5/101615A/MNKD/MannKind.pdf 
Pharmacyte Biotech Inc (OTCMKTS:PMCB): By the end of last trading, the Pharmacyte Biotech (OTCMKTS:PMCB) shares lost 4.92% (or US$0.0006) to US$0.116 with about 2.39 million shares changing hands for the session, compared to its average volume of 1.70 million shares. The company has been increasingly active on the press release front, with a bunch of releases in the two short weeks of the new month so far. There are two recent paid pump mails for the company coming on Oct 8 and Oct 11, compensated with US$18 thousand and US$14 thousand respectively. Is this company running promotion by penny stock promoter? Is there any insider trading in this company? Read full report here. 
Read Full Report: http://www.Pennystocksinsiders.com/PR5/101615A/PMCB/PharmacyteBiotech.pdf
